Field Trips & Education

Events

Educate, celebrate and perpetuate the history, art, and culture of the Chisholm Trail, the American Cowboy, and the American West.

NEW EXHIBIT!

A Chat With Chisholm

Visitors have the opportunity to ask Jesse Chisholm himself questions about his life and the trail in this new interactive exhibit.
